statements: SELECT * FROM healthcare_quality_indicators ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT indicator_name, indicator_value FROM healthcare_quality_indicators WHERE industry_standard > 90;
SELECT DISTINCT industry_standard FROM healthcare_quality_indicators;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_quality_indicators WHERE indicator_value BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT indicator_name, SUM(indicator_value) AS total_value FROM healthcare_quality_indicators GROUP BY indicator_name;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_quality_indicators WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, indicator_name, indicator_value FROM healthcare_quality_indicators WHERE indicator_value >= 100;
SELECT indicator_name, industry_standard FROM healthcare_quality_indicators WHERE industry_standard > 80 ORDER BY indicator_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_quality_indicators WHERE indicator_value BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY indicator_value DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT patient_id, industry_standard FROM healthcare_quality_indicators WHERE industry_standard < 70 ORDER BY patient_id ASC, industry_standard ASC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_quality_indicators;
SELECT indicator_name, performance_score FROM healthcare_quality_indicators;
SELECT indicator_id, indicator_name, performance_score FROM healthcare_quality_indicators ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_quality_indicators WHERE performance_score > 80;
SELECT standard_name, benchmark_score FROM industry_standards ORDER BY benchmark_score ASC;
SELECT indicator_name, performance_score FROM healthcare_quality_indicators WHERE performance_score > 80 ORDER BY performance_score DESC, indicator_name ASC
SELECT indicator_name FROM healthcare_quality_indicators WHERE performance_score BETWEEN 70 AND 90 ORDER BY indicator_name ASC
SELECT indicator_name, performance_score FROM healthcare_quality_indicators WHERE performance_score < 60 ORDER BY performance_score ASC
SELECT standard_name, benchmark_score FROM industry_standards WHERE benchmark_score > 75 ORDER BY benchmark_score DESC, standard_name DESC

SELECT * FROM healthcare_quality_indicators INNER JOIN industry_standards ON healthcare_quality_indicators.indicator_id = industry_standards.standard_id WHERE health_quality_indicators.performance_score > industry_standards.benchmark_score
SELECT * FROM healthcare_facilities;
SELECT facility_name, address, city, state, zip_code FROM healthcare_facilities;
SELECT indicator_name, description, benchmark_value FROM quality_indicators;
SELECT facility_id, indicator_id, performance_score, date_measured FROM indicator_performance;
SELECT city, state, facility_name, address, zip_code FROM healthcare_facilities;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_facilities;
SELECT facility_name, city, state FROM healthcare_facilities WHERE city = 'Boston';
SELECT * FROM quality_indicators WHERE benchmark_value > 80 ORDER BY indicator_name DESC;

SELECT facility_name, indicator_name, performance_score FROM healthcare_facilities INNER JOIN indicator_performance ON healthcare_facilities.id = indicator_performance.facility_id ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT count(*), state FROM healthcare_facilities GROUP BY state ORDER BY count(*) DESC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT provider_name, provider_type FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY provider_type ASC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM healthcare_patients WHERE patient_age > 40;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name, location FROM healthcare_providers WHERE provider_type = 'Hospital';
SELECT rating_id, rating_value FROM healthcare_ratings WHERE rating_value >= 4.5 ORDER BY rating_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers WHERE provider_type = 'Hospital';
SELECT provider_id, provider_name FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT p.provider_name, r.rating_value FROM healthcare_providers p JOIN healthcare_ratings r ON p.provider_id = r.provider_id WHERE r.rating_value >= 4.0;
SELECT hp.patient_name, hm.metric_name, hm.performance_value FROM healthcare_patients hp JOIN healthcare_metrics hm ON hp.patient_id = hm.metric_id WHERE hm.performance_value < hm.benchmark_value;
SELECT DISTINCT provider_type FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT * FROM Hospital;
SELECT name, location FROM Hospital ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT id, name, speciality FROM Doctor WHERE speciality = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM Patient WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, threshold FROM Indicator WHERE threshold < 10;
SELECT * FROM Hospital ORDER BY name DESC, location ASC;
SELECT Doctor.name, Doctor.speciality, Hospital.name AS hospital_name FROM Doctor JOIN Hospital ON Doctor.hospital_id = Hospital.id WHERE Doctor.speciality = 'Cardiology';
SELECT Patient.name, Patient.age, Doctor.name AS doctor_name FROM Patient JOIN Doctor ON Patient.doctor_id = Doctor.id WHERE Patient.age > 50 ORDER BY Patient.age DESC;
SELECT MAX(age) AS max_age, MIN(age) AS min_age FROM Patient;
SELECT Treatment.name, Patient.name AS patient_name, Indicator.name AS indicator_name FROM Treatment JOIN Patient ON Treatment.patient_id = Patient.id JOIN Indicator ON Indicator.threshold < 50;
